# Markdown {.unnumbered}

## GitHub Flavored Markdown

|Style |Syntax |Example | 
|:----|:----|:----|
| Strikethrough| ~~ ~~ | ~~strikethrough~~ |
| Highlight | == == | ==highlight== |
| Blockquotes | >> | >> A quoted paragraph inside a quotation
Break | \</br\> | \</br\> |
| Images | \!\[\]\(\) | ![](https://rimstar.org/science_electronics_projects/how-to-make-a-zoetrope/zoetrope-animated-gif-horse.gif) |
| Superscript| \<sup\> \<\/sup\> | 100m<sup>2</sup> |
| Subscript| \<sub\> \<\/sub\> | 1 billion tonnes CO<sub>2</sub>e |
| Task list |  - [x] |  - [x] Oat milk |
| Emoji | :EMOJICODE: | :+1: |
| Footnote | [^1] | see reference below[^1] |
| Comments | \<!-- --> | \<!-- This content will not appear in the rendered Markdown --> |
| Ignore markdown | \*\* | \*italics\* |
